verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the thirtieth <S%H7970><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the fifth <S%H2568><s%> [day] of the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> while I was by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar <S%H3529><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the exiles, <S%H1473><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> were opened <S%H6605><s%> and I saw <S%H7200><s%> visions <S%H4759><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
(On the fifth <S%H2568><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Jehoiachin's exile, <S%H1546><s%>

the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> expressly <S%H1961><s%> to Ezekiel <S%H3168><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Buzi, <S%H941><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar; <S%H3529><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> upon him.)

And as I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a storm <S%H9370><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> was coming <S%H935><s%> from the north, <S%H6828><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> flashing <S%H3947><s%> forth <S%H3947><s%> continually and a bright <S%H5051><s%> light <S%H5051><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, and in its midst <S%H8432><s%> something like glowing <S%H2830><s%> metal <S%H2830><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire. <S%H784><s%>

And within <S%H8432><s%> it there were figures <S%H1823><s%> resembling <S%H1823><s%> four <S%H702><s%> living <S%H9130><s%> beings. <S%H9130><s%> And this <S%H2088><s%> was their appearance: <S%H4758><s%> they had human <S%H120><s%> form. <S%H1823><s%>
Each <S%H259><s%> of them had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> wings. <S%H3671><s%>

And their legs <S%H7272><s%> were straight <S%H3477><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%> were like a calf's hoof, <S%H3709><s%> <S%H7272><s%> and they gleamed <S%H5340><s%> like burnished <S%H7044><s%> bronze. <S%H5178><s%>

Under <S%H8478><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> on their four <S%H702><s%> sides <S%H7253><s%> [were] human <S%H120><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%> As for the faces <S%H6440><s%> and wings <S%H3671><s%> of the four <S%H702><s%> of them,

their wings <S%H3671><s%> touched <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> another; <S%H269><s%> their [faces] did not turn <S%H5437><s%> when they moved, <S%H1980><s%> each <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> straight <S%H413><s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%> forward. <S%H6440><s%>

As for the form <S%H1823><s%> of their faces, <S%H6440><s%> [each] had the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> all four <S%H702><s%> had the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion <S%H9030><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> and the face <S%H6440><s%> of a bull <S%H7794><s%> on the left, <S%H8040><s%> and all four <S%H702><s%> had the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle. <S%H5404><s%>

Such were their faces. <S%H6440><s%> Their wings <S%H3671><s%> were spread <S%H6504><s%> out above <S%H4480><s%>; <S%H4605><s%> each <S%H376><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> touching <S%H2266><s%> another <S%H376><s%> [being,] and two <S%H8147><s%> covering <S%H3680><s%> their bodies. <S%H1472><s%>

And each <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> straight <S%H413><s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%> forward; <S%H6440><s%> wherever <S%H413><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> was about to go, <S%H1980><s%> they would go, <S%H1980><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> turning <S%H5437><s%> as they went. <S%H1980><s%>

In the midst of the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> there was something that looked <S%H4758><s%> like burning <S%H1197><s%> coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> like <S%H4758><s%> torches <S%H3940><s%> darting <S%H1980><s%> back <S%H1980><s%> and forth among <S%H996><s%> the living <S%H9130><s%> beings. <S%H9130><s%> The fire <S%H784><s%> was bright, <S%H5051><s%> and lightning <S%H1300><s%> was flashing <S%H3318><s%> from the fire. <S%H784><s%>
And the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> ran <S%H7519><s%> to and fro <S%H7725><s%> like <S%H4758><s%> bolts <S%H965><s%> of lightning. <S%H965><s%>

Now as I looked <S%H7200><s%> at the living <S%H9130><s%> beings, <S%H9130><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was one <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the living <S%H9130><s%> beings, <S%H9130><s%> for [each of] the four <S%H702><s%> of them.

The appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> and their workmanship <S%H4639><s%> [was] like sparkling <S%H5869><s%> beryl, <S%H8658><s%> and all four <S%H702><s%> of them had the same <S%H259><s%> form, <S%H1823><s%> their appearance <S%H4758><s%> and workmanship <S%H4639><s%> [being] as if <S%H9201><s%> one wheel <S%H212><s%> were within <S%H8432><s%> another. <S%H212><s%>

Whenever they moved, <S%H1980><s%> they moved <S%H1980><s%> in any <S%H702><s%> of their four <S%H702><s%> directions, <S%H7253><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> turning <S%H5437><s%> as they moved. <S%H1980><s%>

As for their rims <S%H1354><s%> they were lofty <S%H1363><s%> and awesome, <S%H3374><s%> and the rims <S%H1354><s%> of all four <S%H702><s%> of them were full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about. <S%H5439><s%>

And whenever the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> moved, <S%H1980><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> moved <S%H1980><s%> with them. And whenever the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> rose <S%H5375><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> rose <S%H5375><s%> [also.]

Wherever <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> was about to go, <S%H1980><s%> they would go <S%H1980><s%> in that direction. <S%H8033><s%> And the wheels <S%H212><s%> rose <S%H5375><s%> close <S%H5980><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them; for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> [was] in the wheels. <S%H212><s%>

Whenever those went, <S%H1980><s%> these went; <S%H1980><s%> and whenever those stood <S%H5975><s%> still, <S%H5975><s%> these stood <S%H5975><s%> still. <S%H5975><s%> And whenever those rose <S%H5375><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> rose <S%H5375><s%> close <S%H5980><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them; for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> [was] in the wheels. <S%H212><s%>

Now over <S%H5921><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the living <S%H9130><s%> beings <S%H9130><s%> [there was] something like <S%H1823><s%> an expanse, <S%H7549><s%> like the awesome <S%H3372><s%> gleam <S%H5869><s%> of crystal, <S%H7140><s%> extended <S%H5186><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4605><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

And under <S%H8478><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> [were stretched out] straight, <S%H3477><s%> one <S%H802><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the other; <S%H269><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> also had two <S%H8147><s%> wings covering <S%H3680><s%> their bodies <S%H1472><s%> on the one <S%H376><s%> side <S%H1992><s%> and on the other. <S%H2008><s%>

I also heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of their wings <S%H3671><s%> like the sound <S%H6963><s%> of abundant <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> as they went, <S%H1980><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> a sound <S%H6963><s%> of tumult <S%H1999><s%> like the sound <S%H6963><s%> of an army <S%H4264><s%> camp; <S%H4264><s%> whenever they stood <S%H5975><s%> still, <S%H5975><s%> they dropped <S%H7503><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>

And there came <S%H1961><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> from above <S%H5921><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> that was over <S%H5921><s%> their heads; <S%H7218><s%> whenever they stood <S%H5975><s%> still, <S%H5975><s%> they dropped <S%H7503><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>

Now above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> that was over <S%H5921><s%> their heads <S%H7218><s%> there was something <S%H1823><s%> resembling <S%H1823><s%> a throne, <S%H3678><s%> like lapis <S%H68><s%> <S%H5601><s%> lazuli <S%H68><s%> <S%H5601><s%> in appearance; <S%H4758><s%> and on that which <S%H1823><s%> resembled <S%H1823><s%> a throne, <S%H3678><s%> high <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> up, [was] a figure <S%H1823><s%> with the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man. <S%H120><s%>

Then I noticed <S%H7200><s%> from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of His loins <S%H4975><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> something <S%H4758><s%> like glowing <S%H2830><s%> metal <S%H2830><s%> that looked <S%H4758><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> it, and from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of His loins <S%H4975><s%> and downward <S%H4295><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> something <S%H4758><s%> like fire; <S%H784><s%> and [there was] a radiance <S%H5051><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> Him.

As the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the rainbow <S%H7198><s%> in the clouds <S%H6051><s%> on a rainy <S%H1653><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> [was] the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> radiance. <S%H5051><s%> Such <S%H1931><s%> [was] the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> And when I saw <S%H7200><s%> [it,] I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%> and heard <S%H8085><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> speaking. <S%H1696><s%>
